cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DM, cs.SI, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with decision making under uncertainty, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of an axiomatic approach and the mention of von Neumann - Morgenstern's linear utility theory suggest that the paper may also be relevant to decision theory (cs.DM) and social choice theory (cs.SI). Finally, the mention of binary utility suggests that the paper may also be relevant to information theory (cs.IT).
